studienarbeit.prototype

Class StopwordRemoval

  • java.lang.Object
    • studienarbeit.prototype.StopwordRemoval

  • public class StopwordRemoval
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides stopword removal. Uses the StopWordRemover provided by DKPro. All tokens that match those in stopwords.txt are removed from the document. * If the file does not exist or is empty, no stopwords will be removed.

    • Field Summary

      • StopwordRemoval

        StopwordRemoval()
          throws org.apache.uima.resource.ResourceInitializationException

    • Method Detail

      • process

        public org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas process(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas jCas)
                                  throws org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineProcessException
        Remove stopwords. The document is not changed if the file stopwords.txt is not found or is empty.
        Parameters:
        jCas - the document
        Returns:
        document without stopwords
        Throws:
        org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineProcessException
